tilesmallfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	spacewidth 4
	
	! #04608
	"\"" #04609
	# #04610
	$ #04611
	% #04612
	& #04613
	' #04614
	( #04615
	) #04616
	* #04617
	+ #04618
	, #04619
	- #04620
	. #04621
	/ #04622
	0 #04623
	1 #04624
	2 #04625
	3 #04626
	4 #04627
	5 #04628
	6 #04629
	7 #04630
	8 #04631
	9 #04632
	: #04633
	; #04634
	< #04635
	= #04636
	> #04637
	? #04638
	@ #04639
	A #04640
	B #04641
	C #04642
	D #04643
	E #04644
	F #04645
	G #04646
	H #04647
	I #04648
	J #04649
	K #04650
	L #04651
	M #04652
	N #04653
	O #04654
	P #04655
	Q #04656
	R #04657
	S #04658
	T #04659
	U #04660
	V #04661
	W #04662
	X #04663
	Y #04664
	Z #04665
	[ #04666
	\\ #04667
	] #04668
	^ #04669
	_ #04670
	` #04671
	a #04672
	b #04673
	c #04674
	d #04675
	e #04676
	f #04677
	g #04678
	h #04679
	i #04680
	j #04681
	k #04682
	l #04683
	m #04684
	n #04685
	o #04686
	p #04687
	q #04688
	r #04689
	s #04690
	t #04691
	u #04692
	v #04693
	w #04694
	x #04695
	y #04696
	z #04697
	"-{" #04698
	| #04699
	"-}" #04700
	~ #04701
}

tilebigfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 1
	spacewidth 10
	
	0 #03732
	1 #03733
	2 #03734
	3 #03735
	4 #03736
	5 #03737
	6 #03738
	7 #03739
	8 #03740
	9 #03741
	A #03706
	B #03707
	C #03708
	D #03709
	E #03710
	F #03711
	G #03712
	H #03713
	I #03714
	J #03715
	K #03716
	L #03717
	M #03718
	N #03719
	O #03720
	P #03721
	Q #03722
	R #03723
	S #03724
	T #03725
	U #03726
	V #03727
	W #03728
	X #03729
	Y #03730
	Z #03731
}

smallfont2
{
	ignoreoffsets
	spacewidth 4
	minluminosity 0

	! #02930
	"\"" #02931
	# #02932
	$ #02933
	% #02934
	& #02935
	' #02936
	( #02937
	) #02938
	* #02939
	+ #02940
	, #02941
	- #02942
	. #02943
	/ #02944
	0 #02945
	1 #02946
	2 #02947
	3 #02948
	4 #02949
	5 #02950
	6 #02951
	7 #02952
	8 #02953
	9 #02954
	: #02955
	; #02956
	< #02957
	= #02958
	> #02959
	? #02960
	@ #02961
	A #02962
	B #02963
	C #02964
	D #02965
	E #02966
	F #02967
	G #02968
	H #02969
	I #02970
	J #02971
	K #02972
	L #02973
	M #02974
	N #02975
	O #02976
	P #02977
	Q #02978
	R #02979
	S #02980
	T #02981
	U #02982
	V #02983
	W #02984
	X #02985
	Y #02986
	Z #02987
	[ #02988
	\\ #02989
	] #02990
	^ #02991
	_ #02992
	` #02993
	a #02994
	b #02995
	c #02996
	d #02997
	e #02998
	f #02999
	g #03000
	h #03001
	i #03002
	j #03003
	k #03004
	l #03005
	m #03006
	n #03007
	o #03008
	p #03009
	q #03010
	r #03011
	s #03012
	t #03013
	u #03014
	v #03015
	w #03016
	x #03017
	y #03018
	z #03019
	"-{" #03020
	| #03021
	"-}" #03022
	~ #03023
}
